languages.text:
"Купец Бездомный, прочь из царства грез!
За нити кукловода ухватись
И вновь воспрянь, чтоб танец свой исполнить".
{n}Во мраке загорается искра, и свет от нее безжалостно режет тьму, окутавшую вас. На сетчатке проступает уродливое изображение окружающей вас реальности. Вы снова ощущаете свое тело — тело, исполненное боли. Плечо саднит от укола.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Купец Бездомный, прочь из царства грез!
За нити кукловода ухватись
И вновь воспрянь, чтоб танец свой исполнить".
{n}Во мраке загорается искра, и свет от нее безжалостно режет тьму, окутавшую вас. На сетчатке проступает уродливое изображение окружающей вас реальности. Вы снова ощущаете свое тело — тело, исполненное боли. Плечо саднит от укола.{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"From this phantasmagoria retreat
And deftly seize, my Merchant Vagabond,
The puppet master's strings left dangling.
Again rise up to take your place and dance."
{n}A spark ignites in the darkness, and its light ruthlessly cuts through the gloom that envelops you. An ugly image of the reality around you assaults your retina. You can feel your body again and realise it is filled with pain. Your shoulder is sore from an injection.{/n}

traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
“四处漂泊的商人，
莫在黑暗中沉沦。
抓住木偶主人手中的丝线，
再次在舞台上起舞，旋转。”
{n}火花从黑暗中迸发出来，它的光芒无情地划破了笼罩着你的阴霾。你周围丑陋的景色映在了你的眼中。你再次感觉到了你的身体，也感受到了身体中的疼痛。你的肩膀因为注射而疼痛不已。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"From this phantasmagoria retreat
And deftly seize, my Merchant Vagabond,
The puppet master's strings left dangling.
Again rise up to take your place and dance."
{n}A spark ignites in the darkness, and its light ruthlessly cuts through the gloom that envelops you. An ugly image of the reality around you assaults your retina. You can feel your body again and realise it is filled with pain. Your shoulder is sore from an injection.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
“四处漂泊的商人，
莫在黑暗中沉沦。
抓住木偶主人手中的丝线，
再次在舞台上起舞，旋转。”
{n}火花从黑暗中迸发出来，它的光芒无情地划破了笼罩着你的阴霾。你周围丑陋的景色映在了你的眼中。你再次感觉到了你的身体，也感受到了身体中的疼痛。你的肩膀因为注射而疼痛不已。{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
「この幻想から退け
そして巧みに掴み取れ、我が放浪せし商人よ
人形使いの糸は緩んだ
再び立ち上がり、持ち場で踊れ」
{n}暗闇の中で火花が散り、光があたりを包む暗がりを無慈悲に切り裂く。周囲の惨劇が容赦なく目に飛び込んできた。身体に感覚が戻り、身体中が痛むことに気づく。肩には何かを注入された痛みが残っている。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"From this phantasmagoria retreat
And deftly seize, my Merchant Vagabond,
The puppet master's strings left dangling.
Again rise up to take your place and dance."
{n}A spark ignites in the darkness, and its light ruthlessly cuts through the gloom that envelops you. An ugly image of the reality around you assaults your retina. You can feel your body again and realise it is filled with pain. Your shoulder is sore from an injection.{/n}

{n}暗闇の中で火花が散り、光があたりを包む暗がりを無慈悲に切り裂く。周囲の惨劇が容赦なく目に飛び込んできた。身体に感覚が戻り、身体中が痛むことに気づく。肩には何かを注入された痛みが残っている。{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
«Márchate de esta fantasmagoría
y toma en tus manos, Mercader Errante,
los hilos perdidos del titiritero con alegría.
Recupera tu posición en este baile».
{n}Una chispa prende en la oscuridad, y su luz atraviesa sin piedad la penumbra que te envuelve. Una perversa imagen de la realidad que te rodea asalta tus retinas. Vuelves a sentir tu cuerpo, y compruebas que está lleno de dolor. El pinchazo de una inyección aún te duele en el hombro.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"From this phantasmagoria retreat
And deftly seize, my Merchant Vagabond,
The puppet master's strings left dangling.
Again rise up to take your place and dance."
{n}A spark ignites in the darkness, and its light ruthlessly cuts through the gloom that envelops you. An ugly image of the reality around you assaults your retina. You can feel your body again and realise it is filled with pain. Your shoulder is sore from an injection.{/n}

«Márchate de esta fantasmagoría

{n}Una chispa prende en la oscuridad, y su luz atraviesa sin piedad la penumbra que te envuelve. Una perversa imagen de la realidad que te rodea asalta tus retinas. Vuelves a sentir tu cuerpo, y compruebas que está lleno de dolor. El pinchazo de una inyección aún te duele en el hombro.{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
« Quittez cette douce somnolence,
{mf|Marchand Vagabond|Marchande Vagabonde}, et saisissez
Les fils que le marionnettiste a lâchés.
Levez-vous et reprenez la danse. »
{n}Une étincelle vient illuminer les ténèbres et dissiper sans la moindre délicatesse l'obscurité qui vous entoure. Votre rétine est soudainement agressée par une affreuse vision de la réalité. Vous sentez de nouveau votre corps, mais il n'est que souffrance. L'élancement dans votre épaule suggère que l'on a vous récemment injecté quelque chose.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"From this phantasmagoria retreat
And deftly seize, my Merchant Vagabond,
The puppet master's strings left dangling.
Again rise up to take your place and dance."
{n}A spark ignites in the darkness, and its light ruthlessly cuts through the gloom that envelops you. An ugly image of the reality around you assaults your retina. You can feel your body again and realise it is filled with pain. Your shoulder is sore from an injection.{/n}

{n}Une étincelle vient illuminer les ténèbres et dissiper sans la moindre délicatesse l'obscurité qui vous entoure. Votre rétine est soudainement agressée par une affreuse vision de la réalité. Vous sentez de nouveau votre corps, mais il n'est que souffrance. L'élancement dans votre épaule suggère que l'on a vous récemment injecté quelque chose.{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"Aus diesem Trugbild kehrt zurück
und ergreift, mein Händlervagabund,
des Puppenspielers hängende Fäden.
Ergebt Euch zu Eurem Platz und tanzt."
{n}In der Dunkelheit entzündet sich ein Funke, und sein Licht durchschneidet rücksichtslos die Düsternis, die dich umhüllt. Ein hässliches Bild der Realität um dich herum schmerzt deine Netzhaut. Du kannst deinen Körper weder spüren und erkennst, dass er erfüllt ist von Schmerz. Deine Schulter pocht nach einer Injektion.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"From this phantasmagoria retreat

traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"Tatlı uykundan uyan
Pek Berduş Tüccar, al
Kuklacının bıraktığı ipleri.
Oyna yeniden, haydi ayaklan."
{n}Karanlığın içinde bir kıvılcım çakıp ışığı, etrafını saran kasveti insafsızca yırtıyor. Etrafındaki gerçekliğin o çirkin görüntüsü, retinana hücum ediyor. Bedenini ve içinde olduğu acıları yeniden hissedebiliyorsun. Bir enjeksiyondan ötürü omzun ağrıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"From this phantasmagoria retreat
And deftly seize, my Merchant Vagabond,
The puppet master's strings left dangling.
Again rise up to take your place and dance."
{n}A spark ignites in the darkness, and its light ruthlessly cuts through the gloom that envelops you. An ugly image of the reality around you assaults your retina. You can feel your body again and realise it is filled with pain. Your shoulder is sore from an injection.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Bu fantazmagorya kaçış
Ve ustaca el koyuş, Pek Berduş Tüccar,
Kuklacının ipleri sarkar hâlde.
Tekrar ayaklanır, yerini alır, dansa kalkar."
{n}Karanlığın içinde bir kıvılcım çakıyor ve ışığı, etrafını saran kasveti insafsızca yırtıyor. Etrafındaki gerçekliğin o çirkin görüntüsü retinana hücum ediyor. Bedenini ve içinde olduğu acıları yeniden hissedebiliyorsun. Omzun bir enjeksiyon nedeniyle ağrıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito
